text: Pete Domenici (May 7, 1932 - September 13, 2017) was a Republican U.S. Senator from New Mexico. He served in the United States Senate from 1973 to 2009. He was Mayor of Albuquerque from 1967 to 1970. Domenici was born on May 7, 1932 in Albuquerque, New Mexico. He studied at University of New Mexico and at University of Denver. He was married to Nancy Burk Domenici until his death in 2017. They had nine children. Domenici died on September 13, 2017 from complications from abdominal surgery in Albuquerque at the age of 85.End of an Era: Sen. title: Pete Domenici
